job_description:
For 22 years Intranet Connections has been helping connect people at work. We provide a business internal communication platform with the aim to deliver the best employee experience possible, empowering workforces to drive success. We have an established customer base, with well over 600 customers served from different countries and 20 different industries, including many recognizable brands.

Our office provides a modern, open, and collaborative environment overlooking the North Shore mountains. We live core values of Simplicity, Positivity, Integrity, Creativity, Empathy, and Diversity, and we work our best every day to uphold them. If you're SPICED up like us – consider applying below!

Our history is built on our commitment to a customer-first mentality. We take pride in our work and relentlessly pursue making a real difference for our customers and for our team.

Job Description:

We are seeking a skilled and experienced Full Stack .NET 7 and Blazor Web Assemblies Developer to join our dynamic development team. As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining end-to-end web applications using the latest .NET technologies. In addition to .NET 7 and Blazor Web Assemblies expertise, you will have hands-on experience with OAuth, REST APIs, app integration, containerization, cloud environments, Kubernetes, and other related technologies.

Responsibilities:

Develop robust and scalable web applications using .NET 7 and Blazor Web Assemblies.
Design and implement RESTful APIs and integrate with external systems using OAuth.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design system architecture, and provide technical solutions.
Integrate third-party applications and services into existing systems for seamless data flow and functionality.
Write efficient and maintainable code, perform code reviews, and ensure code quality standards are met.
Troubleshoot and debug complex issues, identify and implement appropriate solutions.
Stay updated with the latest advancements in .NET, Blazor Web Assemblies, OAuth, REST APIs, containerization, and cloud technologies.

Requirements:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
Proven experience as a Full Stack .NET Developer with expertise in .NET 7 and Blazor Web Assemblies.
Strong proficiency in C# programming language and the .NET framework.
Hands-on experience with OAuth and implementing secure authentication and authorization mechanisms.
In-depth knowledge of designing and building RESTful APIs.
Experience integrating and consuming third-party APIs and services.
Familiarity with containerization using technologies like Docker.
Experience deploying applications on cloud platforms such as Microsoft Azure.
Working knowledge of Kubernetes for container orchestration.
Solid understanding of front-end development technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).
Experience with version control systems, preferably Git.
Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
Strong communication and teamwork abilities.
Continuous learning mindset and ability to adapt to new technologies.

Preferred Qualifications:

Microsoft certification in .NET development or related technologies.
Knowledge of microservices architecture and implementation.
Familiarity with DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines.
Implementation of integrations interfaces with other SaaS providers

We offer a comprehensive package to our employees, generous paid, salary range 90K - 100K depending on experience, vacation and sick time, extended medical/dental, bonus days off, flexible schedules, dog-friendly office, health and wellness support, professional development, team activities, and more.  Salary is based on qualifications and experience.
